title: Update artist site draft content for JensyPragya (bio, album, and YouTube video)

requirements.text: Replace the placeholder artist identity content with JensyPragya details across the site by updating the central content source (frontend/src/content/artistContent.ts) to reflect: JensyPragya (name), singer and songwriter, emerging pop/kpop artist, currently living in New Delhi, and upcoming album title "Don't Care". Ensure all displayed copy remains in English.

quotes: Create my draft , Jensypragya is a singer and songwriter and emerging as a pop/kpop artist and currently living in New delhi and her upcoming album is don't care .

acceptanceCriteria: Home hero/headers/footers display the artist name as "JensyPragya" (matching the requested casing).
About/Biography text mentions she is a singer and songwriter, emerging as a pop/kpop artist, based in New Delhi, and references the upcoming album "Don't Care".
No remaining visible placeholder identity text for "Aria Sterling" remains in the UI.

requirements.text: Update the Videos section content to include the user-provided YouTube video link by configuring artistContent.videos to embed the YouTube video with ID "X6QUk9-Qw1c" and set the artist YouTube social link to the exact provided URL https://youtu.be/X6QUk9-Qw1c?si=h4FpM3omCMSQQiSA.

quotes: And YouTube  name is JensyPragya and link is https://youtu.be/X6QUk9-Qw1c?si=h4FpM3omCMSQQiSA

acceptanceCriteria: The Videos section renders an embedded YouTube player for video ID "X6QUk9-Qw1c".
The "View All Videos on YouTube" button links to https://youtu.be/X6QUk9-Qw1c?si=h4FpM3omCMSQQiSA (exactly).
The YouTube social icon link in the header/footer links to https://youtu.be/X6QUk9-Qw1c?si=h4FpM3omCMSQQiSA (exactly).

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend canisters/services.
nonGoals: Purchasing, provisioning, or providing a free custom domain name (e.g., jensypragya.com) is out of scope.
Adding third-party authentication providers (anything beyond Internet Identity) is out of scope.
